Body:
os.environ['QT_XKB_CONFIG_ROOT'] = '/usr/share/X11/xkb'
t = [1, 2, 3]
plot(t)
t = [1, 2, 3] * UNITS.meter
plot(t)
x = [4, 5, 6]
plot(x, t)
x = [4, 5, 6] * UNITS.second
plot(x, t)
a = np.array(t)
plot(a)
x = np.array(x)
plot(x, a)
s = TimeSeries(t)
plot(s)
s = TimeSeries(t, x)
plot(s)
s = TimeSeries(a, x)
plot(s)
